item.title: Russia Wants to Make an Example of Telegram
item.description: Published: September 2017 URL: https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2017-09-28/russia-wants-to-make-an-example-of-telegram Abstract: The messaging app isÂ under direct attack from Russian domestic intelligence. The real target may be Facebook and Twitter.
